Class Pair

java.lang.Object
  Pair

public class Pair
extends java.lang.Object

Pair prompts the user for two numbers, then prints the sum, difference, product, average, distance, maximum, and minimum of the two numbers.

Version:
11/14/13
Author:
Eddie Mack
